Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

He opened a comm to StarScream.
"Star, I'm heading for Hell Beasts base. I want you with me."
He looks at Killfest.
"Lets go."
He makes his way out of the base, and in beast mode, tunnels his way
towards the shore line closest to Hell Beasts base.
